steps.title: Assess Circulation
steps.subtitle: Check pulse, motor function, and sensation distal to injury.

steps.title: Immobilize Joint
steps.subtitle: Splint fracture including joints above and below the injury.

steps.title: Check for Bleeding
steps.subtitle: Look for open fractures, control bleeding with direct pressure.

steps.title: Apply Splint
steps.subtitle: Use rigid splint materials, pad bony prominences.

steps.title: Reassess Circulation
steps.subtitle: Recheck pulse and sensation after splinting.

steps.title: Pain Management
steps.subtitle: Provide appropriate pain relief, apply ice if available.
